name.en: Principle of Environmental Sampling and Analysis

department.ch: 環境工程研究所碩士班

goal.en: "This course provides an understanding of the foundamental of sampling analysis, quality assurance and quality control."
goal.ch: "This course provides an understanding of the foundamental of sampling analysis, quality assurance and quality control."

content.en:
"Lec：Quality Assurance &Quality Control
Lec：Data Audit and Calibration
Lec：Detection Limit
Lec：Environmental Sampling I
Lec：Environmental Sampling II
Lec：Introduction of Extraction and Partition
Lec：Fundamental of Optical Measurement
Lec：Ultraviolet - Visable Spectroscopy
Lec：IR & FTIR
Lec：Atom Absorption Spectrometer
Lec：Chromatography I
Lec：Chromatography II
Lab：COD. & BOD.
Lab：UV. & AA.
Lab：HPLC.
Lab：GC."
content.ch:
"Lec：Quality Assurance &Quality Control
Lec：Data Audit and Calibration
Lec：Detection Limit
Lec：Environmental Sampling I
Lec：Environmental Sampling II
Lec：Introduction of Extraction and Partition
Lec：Fundamental of Optical Measurement
Lec：Ultraviolet - Visable Spectroscopy
Lec：IR & FTIR
Lec：Atom Absorption Spectrometer
Lec：Chromatography I
Lec：Chromatography II
Lab：COD. & BOD.
Lab：UV. & AA.
Lab：HPLC.
Lab：GC."

textbook.en: "◎ Basic approaches and methods for quality assurance and quailty control in sample collection and storage for environmental monitoring. ""The Science of the Total Environmental Volume: 176, Issue:1-3, December 22, 1995, ◎Determaination of cadmium and lead in urine by derivative flame atomic absorption spectrometry using the atoms trapping techniques. ""Spectorchemica Acta Part B: Atomic Spectroscopy Volume: 52, Issue: 6, June 15, 1997, ◎Graphical methods for the determination of water/gas partition coefficients of volatile organic compounds by a headspace gas chromatography technique:Bakierowska, A.-M. and Trzeszczynski, J. Fluid Phase Equilibria, 2003, 213, (1-2), 139–146."
textbook.ch: "◎ Basic approaches and methods for quality assurance and quailty control in sample collection and storage for environmental monitoring. ""The Science of the Total Environmental Volume: 176, Issue:1-3, December 22, 1995, ◎Determaination of cadmium and lead in urine by derivative flame atomic absorption spectrometry using the atoms trapping techniques. ""Spectorchemica Acta Part B: Atomic Spectroscopy Volume: 52, Issue: 6, June 15, 1997, ◎Graphical methods for the determination of water/gas partition coefficients of volatile organic compounds by a headspace gas chromatography technique:Bakierowska, A.-M. and Trzeszczynski, J. Fluid Phase Equilibria, 2003, 213, (1-2), 139–146."

grading.ch: "1.考試成績：50% 2.實驗報告成績：30% 3.期末報告成績：20%"

en.competency: The ability to justify principles of judgment and choice with considering the relation between social welfare and environmental sustainability
en.Assessments: Test/Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments ， Attendance/Performance

en.competency: The ability to define and analyze environmental issues, to strategically plan and propose potential solutions
en.Assessments: Test/Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments ， Attendance/Performance

en.competency: The ability to implement scientific knowledge and engineering techniques in the face of environmental problems
en.Assessments: Test/Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments ， Attendance/Performance

en.competency: The ability to assess prospective needs at the macro level, to formulate decision-making, and to direct R & D.
en.Assessments: Test/Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments ， Attendance/Performance

en.competency: The ability to lead positive and effective communication, coordination, cooperation and integration.
en.Assessments: Test/Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments ， Attendance/Performance

en.competency: The ability to persistently innovate intelligent humanities, science and engineering.
en.Assessments: Test/Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments ， Attendance/Performance

ch.competency: 以人為本的社會價值與環境價值判斷與抉擇能力
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 實作/實驗 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 實作/實驗 ， 出席/課堂表現
